thread.section_title: Nelson Alexander Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Nelson Alexander | www.nelsonalexander.com.au
thread.title: John

author: John
title: John
text:
I was recommended Nelson Alexander (Kew) and specifically Nick Whyte by a local solicitor who had joint PoA. Obtained some advice initially before deciding to sell my Aunt's property. Once a final decision to sell had been made, Nick and Jessika went out of their way to make the whole process simple. They made arrangements for cleaning, gardening and dressing the property to best advantage. All costs were clearly explained and the whole process was simple and my decisions made with full confidence.
The Auction was conducted professionally and I am confident that we got the best price and significantly above the reserve.
Overall I was very happy with the campaign, outcome and commend both Nick and Jessika for their attention to detail and hard work
